news.title: Gerai Gramedia Pertama di Karawang Resmi Dibuka
news.lead: PT Gramedia Asri Media meresmikan gerai terbaru di Kota Karawang pada Sabtu (15/10/2016). Gramedia yang berlokasi di Kavling Komersil Blok V Jalan Galuh Mas Raya Teluk Jambe, Karawang, ini mengusung transformasi terbaru. Konsep dan suasana yang nyaman, playful adventurous, serta memorable mengisi atmosfer toko ketika pengunjung hadir.

news.title: 46 Tahun Gramedia, dari Toko Buku Menjadi Ritel
news.lead: JAKARTA, KOMPAS.com - Hari ini, PT Gramedia Asrimedia atau yang lebih dikenal dengan toko buku Gramedia berulang tahun. Perayaan ulang tahun dilaksanakan di Gedung Kompas, Jl. Palmerah Barat Jakarta, Selasa (2/2/2016).

news.title: Siang Ini, Ada Bagi-bagi Buku Gratis untuk Penumpang KRL
news.lead: JAKARTA, KOMPAS.com - Ratusan buku akan dibagikan gratis kepada para pengguna kereta rel listrik (KRL) commuter line yang memiliki tiket berlangganan kartu multi trip (KMT) pada Selasa (17/5/2016) hari ini. Pembagian buku gratis dilakukan untuk memeriahkan Hari Buku Nasional.Manajer Komunikasi PT KAI Commuter Jabodetabek (KCJ) Eva Chairunisa mengatakan, pembagian buku gratis ini akan berlangsung di dalam KRL dari Stasiun Palmerah hingga Stasiun Jakarta kota mulai pukul 10.00 WIB.

news.title: Gramedia Berbagi
news.lead: Renovasi dan Bantuan Perpustakaan SDN 10 Ranomeeto KendariMengawali bulan Oktober ini, Gramedia menyambangi salah satu sekolah tingkat dasar di Kabupaten Konawe Selatan, Kendari, SDN 10 Ranomeeto.

news.title: Asyiknya Belajar Sambil Bermain di Gramedia Science Day
news.lead: Kata sains tidak lagi dipandang sebagai sesuatu yang berat dan rumit. Setidaknya, kesan itulah yang didapatkan ratusan murid sekolah dasar (SD) yang mengikuti rangkaian permainan dalam Gramedia Science Day: Science Olympic 2016 di Indonesia Convention Exhibiton (ICE), Tangerang, Sabtu (1/10/2016).

event.title: Promo Khusus MyValue “Sahabat Awal Bulan” Penuh Diskon Seru!
event.lead: JAKARTA, 24 Maret 2022 Gramedia kembali menghadirkan Online Book Fair Gramedia.com dan Gramedia Digital, yang akan berlangsung pada 25 s.d. 31 Maret 2022. Online Book Fair kali ini mengusung tema #SahabatTanpaBatas, dengan menyediakan lebih dari seribu judul buku dari buku fiksi, non fiksi, maupun buku anak, untuk menjadi sahabat para pelanggan ketika di rumah. Online Book Fair ini akan diselenggarakan secara serentak di seluruh toko Gramedia se-Indonesia.

event.title: Gramedia New Year's GIFT 2024
event.lead: Gramedia menggelar festival maianan, saat ini tengah berlangsung di Gramedia World Karawang. Festival Mainan ini mengusungkan tema “Mattel Holiday” dengan slogan “Happy Playcation”. Festival mainan ini berkolaborasi dengan merek mainan paling terkemuka di dunia yaitu Mattel menampilkan produk seperti Mattel Games, Barbie, HotWheels, Polly Pocked, Thomas & Friends dan Jurrasic World.

event.title: Gramedia Kids Kembali Menggelar Kontes Foto Anak 2022
event.lead: Gramedia Kids menggelar ajang kompetisi anak dalam bidang kreasi foto. Dalam rangkaian kompetisi ini Gramedia Kids mengajak kolaborasi dengan brand mainan ternama yaitu Emco. Pendaftaran dan posting foto instagram dibuka mulai 14 - 28 Februari 2022. Pada saat pendaftaran calon peserta diwajibkan untuk membeli produk Emco unicones.

event.title: Gramedia Kolaborasi Bersama Sahabat UMKM
event.lead: Dalam rangka menyukseskan festival Gramedia Anniversary yang ke 52 tahun bertajuk #KolaborasiTanpaBatas, Gramedia Hadirkan Food and Craft Festival. Acara ini mengajak pengusaha-pengusaha lokal asal Indonesia untuk bisa memperkenalkan UMKM kepada masyarakat. Kolaborasi ini menjadi bukti bahwa Gramedia itu ramah dengan pengusaha lokal, dengan mendukung pemasaran produk UMKM melalui media agar bisa bisa membangun ekonomi kreatif.

event.title: Gramedia Science Day 2021
event.lead: Turut aktif dalam mendorong dan mengembangkan minat anak anak Indonesia dalam bidang Sains, pada tahun 2021 ini Gramedia kembali menggelar Gramedia Science Day.

BOD.title: CEO
BOD.txt: Y. Priyo Utomo is CEO Group of Retail and Book Publishing. Leading for more than 115 Gramedia Bookstores, 12 course outlets (ELTI), 3 distribution center and 6 publishers in nation wide.

BOD.title: Director of Publishing & Education
BOD.txt: PC Suwandi S. Brata is director of Publishing & Education. Leading several publishers belonging to Kompas Gramedia (Grasindo, Gramedia Pustaka Utama, Elex Media Komputindo, Popular Library Gramedia, M & C, Bhuana Popular Science) and ELTI Gramedia as a place for public education.

BOD.title: Operational Director
BOD.txt: As an operational director of PT Gramedia Asri Media, Victorinus Sugiarto is responsible for all company operational activities and the various aspects of Gramedia business to get its objective.

BOD.title: Director of Business Development, Finance & IT
BOD.txt: As director of business development, finance and IT, Kris Herman Masman is responsible for finding business opportunities, business finance analysis, financial flows and the company's entire IT needs include its network and security.

BOD.title: Director of Marketing & Merchandising - Director of HR & FM
BOD.txt: Ignatius Heri Darmawan is currently responsible as a Director of Marketing & Merchandising and Director of HR & FM which leading for more than 115 stores throughout Indonesia, also 6 publishers of Gramedia group.

Publisher.title: Founded in 1974, Gramedia Pustaka Utama is a part of Kompas Gramedia, Indonesia’s largest media network. For more than 40 years Gramedia Pustaka Utama have been publishing many of Indonesia’s best books and home to some of the finest writers.Today, with more than 30 thousand published titles and through its cooperation with more than 200 leading foreign publishers from the all over the world, Gramedia Pustaka Utama has solidified its position as one of the best publishers in Indonesia.In the future, Gramedia Pustaka Utama is committed to being the nation’s agent of change: to choose and produce quality books, to expand horizons, to enlighten people and stimulate creative thinking, all with the support of cutting-edge technologies.

Elex Media Komputindo is a multiplatform family-based content publishing; specialized in children, comics, novel, parenting & family, business, self-improvement, computer, social sciences, and religion & spirituality.

Gramedia Widiasarana Indonesia (GRASINDO) was founded in 1990. Grasindo first publications were textbooks for kindergarten, elementary, high school, and university students. Grasindo believe in delivering quality products and services for the benefit of our customers and partners.With decades of publishing experience, we continuously challenge ourselves to provide the highest level of products and services.
Kepustakaan Populer Gramedia (KPG) specializes in fiction and popular nonfiction books, by local authors as well as translations of notable international works.

BIP was founded in 1992 as a family book publishing business. BIP’s main product is children books. We focus on educational comics, children stories, picture books, and activity books to support early learning for toddlers and babies. However, we also concern for nonfiction books in various themes, such as health, business, leadership, motivation, self-help, and supplementary school-book.Every year, our company publishes more than 300 new titles and almost 60% of them are children books. Bhuana Sastra, Genta, and Qibla are the local publishing imprints of Bhuana Ilmu Populer which publish special book category: Bhuana Sastra for novels, Genta for Christian books, Qibla for Islam books.

The journey of M&C Publisher began as a Comic publisher who successfully published a number of well-known international comic series.In addition to its success in publishing tens of thousands of the best translated comic titles, M&C Publisher is also a collaboration partner for Indonesian comic creators. Many titles published have received the best seller’s title, thus strengthening the existence of M&C Publisher as one of the best comic publishers in Indonesia.Armed with a commitment to build a smart and creative generation, M&C Publishers continues to collaborate with dozens of international publishers and talented local writers to expand their publishing area into the realm of children’s books, novels, non-fiction, and digital-based cross-platform innovations.

Gen information founded is gonna be here continues to collaborate with dozens of international publishers and talented local writers to expand their publishing area into the realm of children’s books, novels, non-fiction, and digital-based cross-platform innovations.

Services.title: Pay & Go is the new payment method from Gramedia with Konsep layanan 'Pay & Go'  yaitu layanan self-service dimana pelanggan bisa langsung melakukan transaksi tanpa bantuan sales assistant Gramedia.

Di Jurusan Pendidikan Bahasa Arab (PBA), nantinya kamu akan mempelajari tentang ilmu kebahasaan Arab, dan ilmu kewirausahaan di bidang bahasa Arab. Mahasiswa jurusan ini tidak hanya bisa menerjemahkan Bahasa Arab saja, namun juga membuat kaligrafi Bahasa Arab.
Gramedia juga melayani pengiriman multi-warehouse hingga ke seluruh toko buku Gramedia di Indonesia. Barang yang dibeli pada Gramedia.com, kini dapat dikirim atau diambil dari toko Gramedia terdekat.
Gramedia juga melayani pengiriman multi-warehouse hingga ke seluruh toko buku Gramedia di Indonesia. Barang yang dibeli pada Gramedia.com, kini dapat dikirim atau diambil dari toko Gramedia terdekat.
